title: key​
content: </> Input.key: Enum.KeyCode The Enum.KeyCode given with Input.new.

title: callback​
content: </> Input.callback: (Player | nil) → () The callback set with Input:setCallback.

title: connection​
content: </> Input.connection: RBXScriptConnection  The connection created in Input:setCallback.

title: new​
content: </> Input.new(key: Enum.KeyCode) → Input Creates an input object with the specified Enum.KeyCode.

title: onTriggered​
content: </> Input:onTriggered(callback: (Player | nil) → ()) → Input Sets the callback to be ran when the input key is pressed.

title: disconnect​
content: </> Input:disconnect() → Input Disconnects the input connection if it was set with Input:setCallback.

title: reconnect​
content: </> Input:reconnect() → Input Reconnects the input connection if the callback was already set with Input:setCallback.
